Uses of Interface
service.ServiceSql

Packages that use ServiceSql
Package
Description
service
 

  • Uses of ServiceSql in service

    Classes in service that implement ServiceSql
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractServiceSql
    Abstract base class for ServiceSql implementations that validates SQL queries by executing them.
    class 
    ServiceSqlImpl
    Concrete implementation of AbstractServiceSql that validates and executes SQL queries using the application's configured JPA and Hibernate infrastructure.
    Methods in service that return ServiceSql
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ServiceSql
    ServiceSqlImpl.getInstance()
    Returns the singleton instance of ServiceSqlImpl.
